channel.title: Illegal on Brainsation
channel.description: Recent content in Illegal on Brainsation

item.title: Why This NFL Superstar's Secret Life Attracted The FBI's Attention
item.description: Have you ever worked so hard in your life that you wanted to let loose and have a bit of dangerous fun? Most of us have and it was no different for this football superstar. He thrived on competition, the thrill and excitement, that it brings to the table when he knocks someone out to run across the field and get that touchdown. The thrill has driven him to be the superstar that he is today.
